name: Dystopia (itch) (Laiet)
description:
Russia released a new regenerative drug, turning the world's economy to hell. Nuclear war commenced and destroyed all natural resources. The world, now filled with cannibalistic savages, is on the brink of total destruction. After 2 years of torture, a man escapes and sets out an aimless journey of self-discovery and violence.

Dystopia is an FPS RPG game set in a post-apocalyptic world.

Game is still in development and more content will be out soon.

Warnings: Contains mild gore, profanity, cannibalism, abuse. 

Playtime: Depends how skilled you are. Normally takes about 30 minutes to 3 hours.

Controls - Uses WASD by default. Other controls adjustable in game.

a journey of self-discovery... and violence...
